title: Technical Writing for Engineers
description: The principles of technical writing. Discussion and application of rhetorical principles in technical environments. Study of methods, resources and common formats used in corporate or research writing. 4 lectures. Crosslisted as ENGL/HNRSÂ 149. Fulfills GE A3.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Area A1 with a C- or better, or consent of instructor; for Engineering students only
